title: Set Up a 301 Redirect
description: An old webpage is being deleted, and an SEO specialist needs to set up a 301 (permanent) redirect to send users and search engines to a new, relevant page.

tasks.description: Identify the old URL that is being deleted.
Identify the most relevant new page to redirect the old URL to.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent selects an appropriate destination URL.

tasks.description: Add the 301 redirect rule to the website's configuration file or redirect management tool.
